author: PTI
title: Coronavirus | India rejects Imran Khan’s allegations of discrimination against Muslims
description: In a tweet, Mr. Khan accused the Indian government of deliberately targeting the Muslim community against the backdrop of the coronavirus crisis.
content:
India on Sunday trashed Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khans comments alleging targeting of Muslims in the country in the backdrop of the coronavirus pandemic.
 External Affairs Ministry Spokesperson Anurag Srivastava said the bizarre comments by the Pakistan… [+799 chars]
